00023   int const WGS_84 = 23;
00024 
00025   void geo_to_utm(double lat, double lon, double &north, double &east) {
00026     char zone[4];
00027     LLtoUTM(WGS_84, lat, lon, north, east, zone);
00028   }
00029   void utm_to_geo(double north, double east, double &lat,  double &lon) {
00030     const char* Zone = "10";
00031     const int NORTHERN_HEMISPHERE_BUFFER = 10000000;
00032     UTMtoLL(WGS_84, 
00033            north + NORTHERN_HEMISPHERE_BUFFER, east, 
00034            Zone, lat, lon);
00035     if(east == 0.0)
00036       lon = -126.0;
00037   }
00038 }

00040 DrifterTracker::DrifterTracker(TeleoReactor::xml_arg_type arg) 
00041   :TeleoReactor(arg, false) {
00042   m_connection.open("messaging.shore.mbari.org", 5672);
00043   m_connection.login("tracking", "MBARItracking", "trackingvhost");
00044 
00045   syslog("amqp")<<"Creating queue \"trex2"<<getName()<<std::endl;
00046   m_queue = m_connection.create_queue("trex2"+getName().str());
00047   provide("MessagesFromTrex");
00048   if( isInternal("MessagesFromTrex") ) {    
00049     // Bind to TREX messages
00050     syslog("amqp")<<"Binding to TREX messages (MessagesFromTrex/TrackingApp)";
00051     m_queue->bind("MessagesFromTrex", "TrackingApp");
00052   } else 
00053     syslog("WARN")<<"MessagesFromTrex timeline already declared";
00054   
00055   boost::property_tree::ptree::value_type &node(xml_factory::node(arg));
00056   TREX::utils::Symbol tl_name;
00057   std::string exch_name;
00058   std::set<std::string> exchs;
00059   TREX::utils::ext_xml(node.second, "config");
00060 
00061   // Now look if I have some asset I need to track 
00062   boost::property_tree::ptree::assoc_iterator i,last;
00063   boost::tie(i, last) = node.second.equal_range("Track");
00064   
00065   for(; last!=i; ++i) {
00066     // First we try to declare it 
00067     tl_name = TREX::utils::parse_attr<TREX::utils::Symbol>(*i, "name");
00068     exch_name = TREX::utils::parse_attr<std::string>(*i, "exchange");
00069     if( tl_name.empty() )
00070       throw TREX::utils::XmlError(*i, 
00071                               "Unable to find the name attribute to Track");
00072     if( exch_name.empty() )
00073       throw TREX::utils::XmlError(*i, 
00074                               "Unable to find the exchange attribute to Track");
00075     else 
00076       exch_name = exch_name+"_pb";
00077 
00078     if( isInternal(tl_name) )
00079       syslog("WARN")<<"I have already declared "<<tl_name<<" as Internal.";
00080     else { 
00081       provide(tl_name);
00082       provide(tl_name.str()+"_msg");
00083       if( isInternal(tl_name) ) {
00084        if( exchs.insert(exch_name).second ) {
00085          syslog("amqp")<<"Binding to "<<exch_name<<"/*";
00086          m_queue->bind(exch_name, "");
00087        }        
00088        m_drifters.insert(std::make_pair(tl_name, point()));
00089       } else 
00090        syslog("WARN")<<"Failed to declare "<<tl_name<<" as Internal."
00091                     <<"\n\tI will not track this asset.";
00092     }
00093   }
00094   m_listener.reset(new amqp::listener(m_queue, m_messages));
00095 }

00097 DrifterTracker::~DrifterTracker() {}

00099 void DrifterTracker::handleInit() {
00100   // It is time to start my thread 
00101   syslog()<<"Initialize queue.";
00102   m_queue->configure(false, true, false);
00103   syslog()<<"Starting the amqp queue listener.";
00104   m_thread.reset(new boost::thread(*m_listener));
00105 
00106   std::map<TREX::utils::Symbol, point>::const_iterator i = m_drifters.begin();
00107   for(;m_drifters.end()!=i; ++i) {
00108     Observation obs(i->first, "undefined");
00109     postObservation(obs);
00110     Observation obs2(i->first.str()+"_msg", "none");
00111     postObservation(obs2);
00112   }
00113 }
00114 
00115 bool DrifterTracker::synchronize() {
00116   while( !m_messages.empty() ) {
00117     boost::shared_ptr<amqp::queue::message> msg = m_messages.pop();
00118     if( msg->exchange()=="MessagesFromTrex" ) {
00119       try {
00120        trex_msg(*msg);
00121       } catch(...) {}
00122     } else 
00123       drifter_msg(*msg);
00124   }
00125   std::map<TREX::utils::Symbol, point>::const_iterator i = m_drifters.begin();
00126   for(;m_drifters.end()!=i; ++i) {
00127     if( i->second.is_valid() ) {
00128       Observation obs(i->first, "Holds");
00129       // obs.restrictAttribute("tick", 
00130       //                        IntegerDomain(timeToTick(i->second.last_update())));
00131       time_t now = std::floor(tickToTime(getCurrentTick()));
00132       long int dt;
00133       std::pair<double, double> tmp = i->second.position(now, dt);
00134       obs.restrictAttribute("northing",
00135                          FloatDomain(tmp.first));
00136       obs.restrictAttribute("easting",
00137                          FloatDomain(tmp.second));
00138       double lat, lon;
00139       utm_to_geo(tmp.first, tmp.second, lat, lon);
00140       obs.restrictAttribute("latitude",
00141                          FloatDomain(lat));
00142       obs.restrictAttribute("longitude",
00143                          FloatDomain(lon));
00144 
00145       double dtick = dt;
00146       dtick /= tickDuration();
00147       obs.restrictAttribute("freshness", IntegerDomain(std::floor(dtick+0.5)));
00148       
00149       // if( i->second.has_speed() ) {
00150       //      tmp = i->second.speed();
00151       //      obs.restrictAttribute("speed_north", FloatDomain(tmp.first));
00152       //      obs.restrictAttribute("speed_east", FloatDomain(tmp.second));
00153       // }
00154       postObservation(obs);
00155     }
00156   }
00157   return true;
00158 }

00160 
00161 void DrifterTracker::drifter_msg(amqp::queue::message const &msg) {
00162   MBARItracking::PlatformReport report;
00163   
00164   if( report.ParseFromArray(msg.body(), msg.size()) ) {
00165     if( report.has_name() ) {
00166       std::map<TREX::utils::Symbol, point>::iterator 
00167        i  = m_drifters.find(report.name());
00168       
00169       if( m_drifters.end()!=i ) {
00170        // I only accept message that have :
00171        //  -  a date
00172        //  - a position 
00173        time_t sec;
00174        double lat, lon;
00175        // syslog("amqp")<<"New message from "<<report.name();
00176        Observation obs(i->first.str() + "_msg", "Msg");
00177        
00178        if( report.has_epoch_seconds() ) {
00179          sec = report.epoch_seconds();
00180          obs.restrictAttribute("tick", IntegerDomain(timeToTick(sec)));
00181          if( report.has_latitude() ) {
00182            lat = report.latitude();
00183            obs.restrictAttribute("latitude", FloatDomain(lat));
00184                 
00185            if( report.has_longitude() ) {
00186              lon = report.longitude();
00187              obs.restrictAttribute("longitude", FloatDomain(lon));
00188 
00189              double north, east;
00190              geo_to_utm(report.latitude(), report.longitude(), north, east);
00191              i->second.update(sec, north, east);
00192              // obs.restrictAttribute("northing", FloatDomain(north));
00193              // obs.restrictAttribute("easting", FloatDomain(east));
00194              if( i->second.has_speed() ) {
00195               obs.restrictAttribute("speed_north", 
00196                                   FloatDomain(i->second.speed().first));
00197               obs.restrictAttribute("speed_east", 
00198                                   FloatDomain(i->second.speed().second));
00199              }
00200              postObservation(obs);
00201            }
00202          }
00203        }
00204       } /* else {
00205        syslog("amqp")<<"Ignoring message from "<<report.name();
00206        } */
00207     }
00208   } 
00209 }

00211 void DrifterTracker::trex_msg(amqp::queue::message const &msg) {
00212    std::string txt(static_cast<char const *>(msg.body()), msg.size());
00213    syslog("amqp")<<"Parsing TREX message : \""<<txt<<"\".";
00214 
00215   /* Former code when I was expecting to recive what TREX actually sent */
00216   // rapidxml::xml_document<> doc;
00217   // doc.parse<0>(const_cast<char *>(txt.c_str()));
00218   // rapidxml::xml_node<> *root = doc.first_node();
00219   // Observation obs("MessagesFromTrex", root->name());
00220   // time_t sec = TREX::utils::parse_attr<time_t>(*root, "utime"); 
00221   // obs.restrictAttribute("tick", IntegerDomain(timeToTick(sec)));
00222   /*
00223     string str1("hello abc-*-ABC-*-aBc goodbye");
00224 
00225     typedef vector< iterator_range<string::iterator> > find_vector_type;
00226     
00227     find_vector_type FindVec; // #1: Search for separators
00228     ifind_all( FindVec, str1, "abc" ); // FindVec == { [abc],[ABC],[aBc] }
00229 
00230     typedef vector< string > split_vector_type;
00231     
00232     split_vector_type SplitVec; // #2: Search for tokens
00233     split( SplitVec, str1, is_any_of("-*"), token_compress_on ); // SplitVec == { "hello abc","ABC","aBc goodbye" }
00234   */
00235    std::vector< std::string > tokens;
00236    boost::split(tokens, txt, boost::is_any_of(","), boost::token_compress_on);
00237    if( tokens.size()==3 ) { 
00238      Observation obs("MessagesFromTrex", tokens[0]);
00239      obs.restrictAttribute("tick", 
00240                         IntegerDomain(timeToTick(TREX::utils::string_cast<time_t>(tokens[1]))));
00241      obs.restrictAttribute("imei", 
00242                         IntegerDomain(TREX::utils::string_cast<unsigned long>(tokens[2])));
00243      postObservation(obs);
00244    }
00245 }
00246 
00247 void DrifterTracker::point::update(time_t t, double n, double e) {
00248   if( valid ) {
00249     long dt = t-date;
00250     m_speed.first = (n-m_position.first);
00251     m_speed.second = (e-m_position.second);
00252     m_speed.first /= dt;
00253     m_speed.second /= dt;
00254     with_speed = true;
00255   } else 
00256     with_speed = false;
00257   date = t;
00258   m_position.first = n;
00259   m_position.second = e;
00260   valid = true;  
00261 }
00262 
00263 std::pair<double, double> DrifterTracker::point::position(time_t now, 
00264                                                    long int &delta_t) const {
00265   std::pair<double,double> est_pos(m_position);
00266   delta_t = now-date;
00267   
00268   est_pos.first += delta_t*m_speed.first;
00269   est_pos.second += delta_t*m_speed.second;
00270   
00271   return est_pos;
00272 }
